en.latex:
If \( x+\frac{1}{x}=5\), calculate without using a calculator, the value of</br>
 [Hint: Square the given and use factorisation!]
en.html:
If \( x+\frac{1}{x}=5\), calculate without using a calculator, the value of</br>
 [Hint: Square the given and use factorisation!]

en.latex:
$$
\begin{align}
&a(m-n)+a^{2}-m n\\
&=a m-a n+a^{2}-m n\\
&=a m+a^{2}-a n-m n\\
&=a(m+a)-n(a+m)\\
&=(m+a)(a-n)\\
\end{align}
$$
en.html:
$$
\begin{align}
&a(m-n)+a^{2}-m n\\
&=a m-a n+a^{2}-m n\\
&=a m+a^{2}-a n-m n\\
&=a(m+a)-n(a+m)\\
&=(m+a)(a-n)\\
\end{align}
$$

&=(m+a)(a-n)\\
\end{align}
$$

en.latex:
$$
\begin{aligned}
\left(x+\frac{1}{x}\right)^{2}&=(5)^{2} \\
\left(x+\frac{1}{x}\right)\left(x+\frac{1}{x}\right)&=25 \\
x^{2}+\frac{\not x \times 1}{\not x}+\frac{1}{\not x} \times x+\frac{1}{x^{2}}&=25 \\
x^{2}+1+1+\frac{1}{x^{2}}&=25 \\
\therefore x^{2}+\frac{1}{x^{2}}&=25-1-1\\
&=23
\end{aligned}
$$
en.html:
$$
\begin{aligned}
\left(x+\frac{1}{x}\right)^{2}&=(5)^{2} \\
\left(x+\frac{1}{x}\right)\left(x+\frac{1}{x}\right)&=25 \\
x^{2}+\frac{\not x \times 1}{\not x}+\frac{1}{\not x} \times x+\frac{1}{x^{2}}&=25 \\
x^{2}+1+1+\frac{1}{x^{2}}&=25 \\
\therefore x^{2}+\frac{1}{x^{2}}&=25-1-1\\
&=23
\end{aligned}
$$

x^{2}+1+1+\frac{1}{x^{2}}&=25 \\
\therefore x^{2}+\frac{1}{x^{2}}&=25-1-1\\

\end{aligned}
$$

x^{2}+1+1+\frac{1}{x^{2}}&=25 \\
\therefore x^{2}+\frac{1}{x^{2}}&=25-1-1\\
&=23
\end{aligned}
$$

en.latex:
$$
\begin{align}
&\frac{\frac{2}{x-2}+\frac{1}{x-1}}{\frac{3}{x^{2}-2 x}+\frac{1}{x}}\\
&=\left(\frac{2}{x-2}+\frac{1}{x-1}\right) \div\left(\frac{3}{x(x-2)}+\frac{1}{x}\right)\\
&=\left(\frac{2}{(x-2)}+\frac{1}{(x-1)}\right) \div\left(\frac{3+1(x-2)}{x(x-2)}\right)\\
&=\left(\frac{2(x-1)+1(x-2)}{(x-2)(x-1)}\right) \div\left(\frac{3+1 x-2}{x(x-2)}\right)\\
&=\left(\frac{2 x-2+1 x-2}{(x-2)(x-1)}\right) \div\left(\frac{(x+1)}{x(x-2)}\right)\\
&=\frac{(3 x-4)}{(\not x-\not 2)(x-1)} \times \frac{x(\not x-\not 2)}{(x+1)}\\
&=\frac{x(3 x-4)}{(x-1)(x+1)}\\
\end{align}
$$
en.html:
$$
\begin{align}
&\frac{\frac{2}{x-2}+\frac{1}{x-1}}{\frac{3}{x^{2}-2 x}+\frac{1}{x}}\\
&=\left(\frac{2}{x-2}+\frac{1}{x-1}\right) \div\left(\frac{3}{x(x-2)}+\frac{1}{x}\right)\\
&=\left(\frac{2}{(x-2)}+\frac{1}{(x-1)}\right) \div\left(\frac{3+1(x-2)}{x(x-2)}\right)\\
&=\left(\frac{2(x-1)+1(x-2)}{(x-2)(x-1)}\right) \div\left(\frac{3+1 x-2}{x(x-2)}\right)\\
&=\left(\frac{2 x-2+1 x-2}{(x-2)(x-1)}\right) \div\left(\frac{(x+1)}{x(x-2)}\right)\\
&=\frac{(3 x-4)}{(\not x-\not 2)(x-1)} \times \frac{x(\not x-\not 2)}{(x+1)}\\
&=\frac{x(3 x-4)}{(x-1)(x+1)}\\
\end{align}
$$

en.latex: Factorise completely: \(y^{2}-4 y+4-3 m y+6 m\)
en.html: Factorise completely: \(y^{2}-4 y+4-3 m y+6 m\)

en.latex:
Simplify completely:</br>
\(\frac{a b+2 a}{a b-2 a} \div\left(\frac{b^{2}+2 b}{b+3} \times \frac{b^{2}}{a b^{2}-3 a b+2 a}\right)\)
en.html:
Simplify completely:</br>
\(\frac{a b+2 a}{a b-2 a} \div\left(\frac{b^{2}+2 b}{b+3} \times \frac{b^{2}}{a b^{2}-3 a b+2 a}\right)\)

en.latex:
$$
\begin{align}
&\frac{a b+2 a}{a b-2 a} \div\left(\frac{b^{2}+2 b}{b+3} \times \frac{b^{2}}{a b^{2}-3 a b+2 a}\right)\\
&=\frac{\not a(b+2)}{\not a(b-2)} \div\left(\frac{b(b+2)}{(b+3)} \times \frac{b^{2}}
{a\left(b^{2}-3b+2\right)}\right)\\
&=\frac{(b+2)}{(b-2)} \div\left(\frac{b(b+2)}{(b+3)} \times \frac{b^{2}}{a(b-2)(b-1)}\right)\\
&=\frac{(b+2)}{(b-2)} \div \frac{b^{3}(b+2)}{a(b+3)(b-2)(b-1)}\\
&=\frac{(\not b+\not 2)}{(\not b-\not 2)} \times \frac{a(b+3)(\not b-\not 2)(b-1)}{b^{3}(\not b+\not 2)}\\
&=\frac{a(b+3)(b-1)}{b^{3}}\\
\end{align}
$$
en.html:
$$
\begin{align}
&\frac{a b+2 a}{a b-2 a} \div\left(\frac{b^{2}+2 b}{b+3} \times \frac{b^{2}}{a b^{2}-3 a b+2 a}\right)\\
&=\frac{\not a(b+2)}{\not a(b-2)} \div\left(\frac{b(b+2)}{(b+3)} \times \frac{b^{2}}
{a\left(b^{2}-3b+2\right)}\right)\\
&=\frac{(b+2)}{(b-2)} \div\left(\frac{b(b+2)}{(b+3)} \times \frac{b^{2}}{a(b-2)(b-1)}\right)\\
&=\frac{(b+2)}{(b-2)} \div \frac{b^{3}(b+2)}{a(b+3)(b-2)(b-1)}\\
&=\frac{(\not b+\not 2)}{(\not b-\not 2)} \times \frac{a(b+3)(\not b-\not 2)(b-1)}{b^{3}(\not b+\not 2)}\\
&=\frac{a(b+3)(b-1)}{b^{3}}\\
\end{align}
$$
